title: Doc tests cannot be run on wasm32-unknown-unknown target using `doctest-xcompile` feature.
body:
Doc tests cannot be run on wasm32-unknown-unknown target using `doctest-xcompile` feature. Rustdoc tries to create a temporary directory on a target where there is no file system available and fails ## Steps to re-produce 1. Create a cargo project with the following structure:
src/lib.rs ```rust /// ```rust /// fn greet(name: &str) { /// let window = web_sys::window().unwrap(); /// window.alert_with_message(&format!("Hello, {}!", name)); /// } /// ``` pub fn do_nothing() { } ```
Cargo.toml ```toml [package] name = "doctest-xcompile-bug" version = "0.1.0" edition = "2021" # See more keys and their definitions at https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/manifest.html [dependencies] wasm-bindgen = "0.2" web-sys = { version = "0.3", features = ["Window"] } ```
.cargo/config ```toml [target.'cfg(target_arch = "wasm32")'] runner = 'wasm-bindgen-test-runner' [unstable] doctest-xcompile = true ```
2. Ensure wasm-bindgen test runner is properly set-up to be used without wasm-pack. See [documentation](https://rustwasm.github.io/wasm-bindgen/wasm-bindgen-test/usage.html#appendix-using-wasm-bindgen-test-without-wasm-pack). 3. Run `cargo +nightly test --doc --target wasm32-unknown-unknown` ## Expected behavior Test runs successfully and passes. ## Actual behavior ```sh $ cargo +nightly test --doc --target wasm32-unknown-unknown Finished test [unoptimized + debuginfo] target(s) in 0.03s Doc-tests doctest-xcompile-bug running 1 test test src/lib.rs - do_nothing (line 1) ... FAILED failures: ---- src/lib.rs - do_nothing (line 1) stdout ---- Test executable failed (exit status: 1). stdout: stderr: Error: creating temporary directory Caused by: Permission denied (os error 13) failures: src/lib.rs - do_nothing (line 1) test result: FAILED. 0 passed; 1 failed; 0 ignored; 0 measured; 0 filtered out; finished in 0.11s error: test failed, to rerun pass '--doc' ``` ### Meta ``` $ rustc +nightly --version --verbose rustc 1.62.0-nightly (69a5d2481 2022-04-27) binary: rustc commit-hash: 69a5d2481e856a5a18885390b8cf6950b9ff8dd3 commit-date: 2022-04-27 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.62.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.1 ```
